title: cultural_data_Museum_of_Velimir_Khlebnikov
text:
ï»¿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.msl.velimir.
Application Name: Museum of Velimir Khlebnikov.
Number of Reviews: 7.00.
Application Description: Mobile guide to Museum of V. Khlebnikov will take you to the creative world of the great Russian poet and writer. Exclusive multimedia tours through the halls and exhibits of the museum will tell you about poet's life, reflect inspiration of his literary world and get you acquainted with his work and achievements. Use interactive map to explore the halls of the museum. Through automatic recognition of the exhibits via scanner you will be provided with various information on the museum's exposition. Rich multimedia materials will help to unleash the creative path of Khlebnikov and show his contribution to the world literature. Museum of V.Khlebnikov is the winner of grant competition "Changing Museum in a Changing World" by Vladimir Potanin Foundation.Read moreCollapse.
